titles.title: IPO Act
Integrity for Public Officials Act
IPO Act
To prohibit senior Government officials, including Members of Congress, from purchasing or selling certain investments, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on Agriculture, Oversight and Reform, House Administration, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
